name: gmp-ui-test
description: Playwright end-to-end tests for GMP Web App

scripts.test: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && npx playwright test
scripts.test:ui: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:headed: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && npx playwright test --debug
scripts.e2e-test: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && npx playwright test
scripts.e2e-ui: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:local: cross-env BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000/gmp-web-app npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && cross-env BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000/gmp-web-app npx playwright test
scripts.test:local:ui: cross-env BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000/gmp-web-app npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && cross-env BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000/gmp-web-app npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:production: cross-env BASE_URL=https://pablodur2000.github.io/gmp-web-app npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && cross-env BASE_URL=https://pablodur2000.github.io/gmp-web-app npx playwright test
scripts.test:production:ui: cross-env BASE_URL=https://pablodur2000.github.io/gmp-web-app npx playwright install --with-deps chromium && cross-env BASE_URL=https://pablodur2000.github.io/gmp-web-app npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:local:pwsh: powershell -Command "$env:BASE_URL='http://localhost:3000/gmp-web-app'; npx playwright install --with-deps chromium; npx playwright test --ui"
scripts.test:production:pwsh: powershell -Command "$env:BASE_URL='https://pablodur2000.github.io/gmp-web-app'; npx playwright install --with-deps chromium; npx playwright test --ui"
